name: Bubblegum Roguelike
description:
Traverse the infinite dungeon, going deeper and deeper with only your trusty Ice Pop Sword for company. How deep can you go?

Slay enemies, collect gold, and pickup ice cream to heal your wounds.

Controls:
- WASD, arrow keys, dvorak WASD equivalent(,AOE) to move
- left click for normal attack
- right click to knockback
- space on gameover screen to restart
